name: Ricochet (itch) (alexander_matos)
description:
Ricochet serves as a portfolio piece that shows my skills programming in C#, Unity and Game Development.

Controls:

  • A for left Flipper
  • D for right Flipper
  • SpaceBar for plunger 

*I JUST WANT TO GET THE MECHANICS OF THE GAME NAILED DOWN FIRST, THAN I'LL MAKE IT MORE PRESENTABLE*
